utilizationBanner.overageNote90: When you reach 100% of your credits, overage billing will be automatically activated at {{overagePrice}} per credit. This ensures uninterrupted service.

installationGuide.title: Step-by-Step Installation Guide
installationGuide.subtitle: Quick installation in minutes
installationGuide.appEmbedDescription: App embed blocks work with ALL Shopify themes (including vintage themes). They are added to your theme layout and automatically appear on all relevant pages (product pages for the button, home page for the banner) without needing to add them to individual templates. No theme code editing required!
installationGuide.step1Description: Make sure you have installed the NusenseTryOn app from the Shopify App Store. If you haven't installed it yet, go to Apps > App Store and search for 'NusenseTryOn'.
installationGuide.step1NoteText: App embed blocks work with ALL Shopify themes (including vintage themes). They are added to your theme layout and work across all pages automatically. No theme code editing required!
installationGuide.step2Description: Add the Try-On button app embed to your theme layout. The button will automatically appear on all product pages above the Add to Cart button.
installationGuide.step2Instruction1: Click the 'Add Button' button below - it will automatically open your theme editor and activate the button app embed
installationGuide.step2Instruction2: The app embed block will be automatically activated and ready to use
installationGuide.step2Instruction3: The button will automatically appear on all product pages above the Add to Cart button
installationGuide.step2Instruction4: Customize the button style, text, and settings in the theme editor if needed
installationGuide.step2Instruction5: Click 'Save' in the theme editor to publish your changes
installationGuide.step2TipText: App embed blocks are added to your theme layout, so they work across all pages automatically. The button will only show on product pages.
installationGuide.step2QuickAccessText: One-click installation: Click below to automatically activate the button app embed in your theme
installationGuide.step2RestrictedText: Please select a plan to access installation features
installationGuide.step3Title: Add Home Page Banner App Embed
installationGuide.step3Description: Add the promotional banner app embed to your theme layout. The banner will automatically appear on your home page to promote the virtual try-on feature.
installationGuide.step3Instruction1: Click the 'Add Banner' button below - it will automatically open your theme editor and activate the banner app embed
installationGuide.step3Instruction2: The app embed block will be automatically activated and ready to use
installationGuide.step3Instruction3: The banner will automatically appear on your home page
installationGuide.step3Instruction4: You can enable/disable the banner anytime in the app embed settings
installationGuide.step3Instruction5: Click 'Save' in the theme editor to publish your changes
installationGuide.step3TipText: The banner only appears on your home page. Visitors can dismiss it, and it will remember their preference for the session.
installationGuide.step3QuickAccessText: One-click installation: Click below to automatically activate the banner app embed in your theme
installationGuide.step3RestrictedText: Please select a plan to access installation features
installationGuide.step4Description: Once you've added both app embed blocks, your virtual try-on feature is ready to use. The button will appear on all product pages, and the banner will show on your home page.
installationGuide.step4CongratulationsText: Your virtual try-on feature is now live. Customers can try on products directly from your product pages!
